item.title: How to Write a Unit Test for a Remote Procedural Call in Golang
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: Recently I have been learning about remote procedural calls (RPCs) in *Golang and realized I was unable to find an easy example on how to write a unit test for RPCs. In this post, I’ll explain how I figured out a solution.
